posts.post_content:
Thinking about starting a back run. I have the AB Frame (hey, ya gotta start somewhere!!). Please shoot me a PM with scans and prices if you have anything available. Looking for lower grade SGC/PSA(1-3) or raw.

Thanks for looking.

Best,

Steve

Steve,

My Izzy is an SGC 60 with the very rare Piedmont 350 reverse.
I assume it doesn't meet your criteria.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/49087/hoffman-izzy[/IMG]
That is a beauty, Frank! I do need a Piedmont, looking for a more “distressed” example. :D:D
